title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 285.8 - Meeting place
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 285.8 - Meeting place

State Regulations

In cities or other places where the Department of Labor has
an office, boards of inquiry shall so far as possible hold their meetings in
such office. Where that is impossible, the secretary of the board shall arrange
for its meetings in a suitable public building. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
285.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
